mapper.select:
select
from
and menu_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{menuId}), '%') and path like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{path}), '%') and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%') and icon like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{icon}), '%') and hideInMenu like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hideinmenu}), '%') and exact like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{exact}), '%') and component like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{component}), '%') and type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{type}), '%') and parent_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{parentId}), '%') and remark like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remark}), '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into
( menu_id, path, name, icon, hideInMenu, exact, component, type, parent_id, remark) values
( #{entity.menuId}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.hideinmenu}, #{entity.exact}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.remark})

insert into
( menu_id, path, name, icon, hideInMenu, exact, component, type, parent_id, remark) values
(#{entity.menuId},#{entity.path},#{entity.name},#{entity.icon},#{entity.hideinmenu},#{entity.exact},#{entity.component},#{entity.type},#{entity.parentId},#{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update menu_id=values(menu_id), path=values(path), name=values(name), icon=values(icon), hideInMenu=values(hideInMenu), exact=values(exact), component=values(component), type=values(type), parent_id=values(parent_id), remark=values(remark)
